views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 13 only

Price: $1.99 USD
Purchase from Settings panel

Run applications, run!

Gump lets applications keep running through resprings and SpringBoard crashes.

You have full control over which applications should stay alive through resprings and if you would like the now playing application to continue playing music.

Configure options from Settings.

Gump has been rewritten from the ground up to improve efficiency and stability, fix bugs and improve compatibility with other tweaks. Fixed a bug where the lockscreen media player wouldnt update when playing. Should fix issues with dpkg. Corrected the minimum OS in the control file.

Fixed issue where apps sometimes would not close after respringing. Fixed issue where music would temporarily stop occasionally during a respring. Fixed issue where apps would sometimes close when respringing. Fixed clashes with many tweaks that inject into UIKit. Many other major bug fixes.
